languages.text: "Тысячи и тысячи голосов вопиют о спасении... о надежде... о несдержанном обещании... Их боль... твоя награда, дознаватель".
"Thousands and thousands of voices crying out for salvation... in hope... with wild promises... Their pain... is your reward, Interrogator."
languages.original_text: "Тысячи и тысячи голосов вопиют о спасении... о надежде... о несдержанном обещании... Их боль... твоя награда, дознаватель".

traits.locale_text: "Thousands and thousands of voices crying out for salvation... in hope... with wild promises... Their pain... is your reward, Interrogator."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thousands and thousands of voices crying out for salvation... in hope... with wild promises... Their pain... is your reward, Interrogator."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Thousands and thousands of voices crying out for salvation... in hope... with wild promises... Their pain... is your reward, Interrogator."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “成千上万个声音在呼唤救赎……渴求希望……带着疯狂的承诺……他们的痛苦……便是你的报酬，审讯官。”
languages.original_text: "Thousands and thousands of voices crying out for salvation... in hope... with wild promises... Their pain... is your reward, Interrogator."

traits.locale_text: “成千上万个声音在呼唤救赎……渴求希望……带着疯狂的承诺……他们的痛苦……便是你的报酬，审讯官。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Miles y miles de voces suplican la salvación... con esperanza... y promesas imposibles... Su dolor... es su recompensa, interrogador».
languages.original_text: "Thousands and thousands of voices crying out for salvation... in hope... with wild promises... Their pain... is your reward, Interrogator."

traits.locale_text: «Miles y miles de voces suplican la salvación... con esperanza... y promesas imposibles... Su dolor... es su recompensa, interrogador».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「何千、何万という声が救いを求めて叫んでいる…希望の中…乱暴な約束で…彼らの痛みは…インテロゲイター、あなたの報酬です」
languages.original_text: "Thousands and thousands of voices crying out for salvation... in hope... with wild promises... Their pain... is your reward, Interrogator."

traits.locale_text: 「何千、何万という声が救いを求めて叫んでいる…希望の中…乱暴な約束で…彼らの痛みは…インテロゲイター、あなたの報酬です」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Tausende und Abertausende von Stimme flehen um Erlösung ... voller Hoffnung ... mit wilden Versprechen ... Ihr Schmerz ... ist Euer Lohn, Interrogator."
languages.original_text: "Thousands and thousands of voices crying out for salvation... in hope... with wild promises... Their pain... is your reward, Interrogator."

traits.locale_text: "Tausende und Abertausende von Stimme flehen um Erlösung ... voller Hoffnung ... mit wilden Versprechen ... Ihr Schmerz ... ist Euer Lohn, Interrogator."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Des milliers et des milliers de voix en quête de de salut... remplies d'espoir... et de vaines promesses... Leur souffrance... est votre récompense, interrogateur. »
languages.original_text: "Thousands and thousands of voices crying out for salvation... in hope... with wild promises... Their pain... is your reward, Interrogator."

traits.locale_text: « Des milliers et des milliers de voix en quête de de salut... remplies d'espoir... et de vaines promesses... Leur souffrance... est votre récompense, interrogateur. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Binlerce ve binlerce ses kurtuluş için yakarıyor... Umut içinde... Uçuk vaatler eşliğinde... Onların acısı senin ödülündür Sorgucu."
languages.original_text: "Thousands and thousands of voices crying out for salvation... in hope... with wild promises... Their pain... is your reward, Interrogator."
